===Search for a police chief===
===Search for a police chief===
â
With all but three police officers having quit, mayor JosÃ© Luis Guerrero desperately sought solutions. After a year without a police chief, 20 year old Marisol Valles Garcia, who was a student working on a degree in [[criminology]] at the [[University of Guadalajara]],<ref name=Lundin /><ref name=Jazeera /> was the only person willing to accept the job. She was sworn in on 18 October 2010.<ref name=Winter /> This attracted international attention, and has prompted news media to call her the "bravest woman in Mexico".<ref name=Brice /><ref name=Ordaz /> However, after fleeing to the United States, many believe her acceptance of the job was part of a ploy to be granted American citizenship through asylum.
+
With all but three police officers having quit, mayor JosÃ© Luis Guerrero desperately sought solutions. After a year without a police chief, 20 year old Marisol Valles Garcia, who was a student working on a degree in [[criminology]] at the [[University of Guadalajara]],<ref name=Lundin /><ref name=Jazeera /> was the only person willing to accept the job. She was sworn in on 18 October 2010.<ref name=Winter /> This attracted international attention, and has prompted news media to call her the "bravest woman in Mexico".<ref name=Brice /><ref name=Ordaz />
